jobTitle: Warehouse Associates - Furniture and Home Decor
jobDescription: Scandinavian Designs is a home furnishings destination rooted in our love for modern design and quality craftsmanship. We are looking for part-time (24 hours/week) Warehouse Associates to work in our San Jose and Cupertino, CA locations.  Be part of a team that creates a best in class customer experience for every customer, every time. Provide friendly and efficient service to our customers during merchandise pickups. Help maintain an organized and efficient warehouse, moving our products with care to avoid damage. Our Warehouse Associates are versatile and active professionals, who work as part of a team in the showroom, office and warehouse - anywhere their efforts are needed. Qualifications:Successful Warehouse Associates have High School diploma or equivalent.1-3 years successful work experience, preferably in a warehouse environment.Good communication skills and are able to read invoices, use computer terminals to look up information.Heavy lifting up to 50 lbs. unassisted.They must be able to use a hand truck, understands assemblies and correctly operate small power tools.Obtaining forklift certification is required at some of our facilities.Associates must be 18 years or older and possess and maintain a valid drivers license in the state where their position is located.Able to successfully complete our pre-employment physical, background and drug screenings. Scandinavian Designs now operates 32 stores across seven states under the brand names Scandinavian Designs, Dania Furniture and nationwide for SCANDIS.com. We offer extensive product and sales training to facilitate career growth. Our compensation includes a competitive pay program, incentives and a comprehensive health and retirement benefits package.  We are an Equal Opportunity Employer.
